Text: The bonus speed of the tubeway (Game default: 300%)
The speed of the zipline (Game default: 150%)
The maximum number of connections a zipline can have (Game default: 2)
The maximum distance a zipline can have (Game default: 30)
The maximum inclination of the zipline cable (Game default: 50)
Allow ziplines to go through obstacles (Game default: false)
Let the Iron Teeth build Ziplines (Game default: false). Also, allow them to build Ziporter if you have that mod installed.
Let the Folktails build Tubeways (Game default: false)
